name: TaobaoEnglish
tag_list: taobao, taobao-english-agent, shopping-on-taobao, buy-from-china, online-shopping, taobao-guide
overview:
<a href="http://www.taobaoenglish.com">TaobaoEnglish.com</a> is a <strong>Taobao English Agent</strong> Site that help foreign wholesalers, retailers and consumers buy bulk goods from online markets, factories or shopping on China main online markets, stores with small quantity for small business like ebay-seller, blog-seller or entity shop.

Their main business is buy items from <strong>taobao.com</strong>. They start this business since 2008, help hundreds of customers bought many kinds of items they want to <strong>buy from China</strong>.

If you do not know how to select items from Taobao, you can go to this page for help: <a href="http:www.taobaoenglish.com/html/help/howto_buyon_taobao.html">How to buy on taobao.com?</a>

If you know how to select items from Taobao but do not know how to place order and how to pay items, you can go to this page for help: <a href="http://www.taobaoenglish.com/html/quick_tour.html">How to buy from taobao.com via TaobaoEnglish.com?</a>

What is <strong>Taobao.com</strong>? Taobao.com is the biggest online market in China, even in Asia. Listed millions of goods come from local factories directly with good price and quality. Just go to <a href="http://www.taobao.com">Taobao</a> to check it yourself. There have a comprehensive mall which quality guaranteed by Taobao.com called <a href="http:www.tmall.com">Taobao Mall</a>, which will make your shopping time more enjoyable.

For more info, please visit <a href="www.taobaoenglish.com">TaobaoEnglish.com</a>
